definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Orcus cannot use his spell resistance to overcome this effect.
sentences.chinese: 奧庫斯不能用他的法術抗力來克服這個效果。

sentences.english: The difference is that psionic powers are spell-like abilities.
sentences.chinese: 區別是心靈異能是類法術能力。

sentences.english: Brain Freeze now only affects your frost damage spells with chilling effects.
sentences.chinese: 大腦凍結現在隻影響附帶寒冷效果的冰系傷害法術。

sentences.english: Thus, the spell disintegrates only part of any very large object or structure targeted.
sentences.chinese: 因此，此法術只能解離龐大物體或結構的一部分。

sentences.english: Dragon Form: Flame Breath engulfs all units in a cone in front of Shyvana.
sentences.chinese: 處於龍族形態下，烈焰吐息將變爲錐形的範圍法術。

sentences.english: Only spell-like abilities are important for purposes of this book.
sentences.chinese: 類法術能力纔是本書所關注的。

sentences.english: Black nectar cannot be used for scrying or as a power component.
sentences.chinese: 黑色的花蜜無法用來探知也無法作爲法術材料。

sentences.english: Of course, it is also the spell that has the most counters in the game.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的，在遊戲中這系法術也是持續最久的。

sentences.english: And Hold Portal, a spell that holds doors shut for a few minutes.
sentences.chinese: 以及封門術，一個可以將門戶封閉數分鐘的法術。

sentences.english: Players can now cast item targetable spells on items that are in your action bar.
sentences.chinese: 玩家現在可以在動作條中點擊物品來施放一些法術。

sentences.english: What I am really getting at are things like Swiftmend and Riptide .
sentences.chinese: 我們目前在這方面做到的法術有迅捷治療和激流。
我在研究法術規則，鮑勃。

sentences.english: A fascinated creature is entranced by a supernatural or spell effect.
sentences.chinese: 著迷狀態是指被超自然能力或是法術能力給迷住了。

sentences.english: Counterspell no longer generates a high amount of threat.
sentences.chinese: 法術反制不再造成較高的威脅值。

sentences.english: There is now a black swirly animation when a spell is resisted.
sentences.chinese: 當法術被抵抗的時候有一個黑色旋渦形的效果。

sentences.english: The hunter spell "Volley" has had its tooltip updated to reflect that it is channeled.
sentences.chinese: 亂射的說明文字將明確表示它是一個通道法術。

definition: (of a spirit or deity) to possess sb
unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
lit. to have accumulated knowledge and deliver it slowly (idiom)/good preparation is the key to success/to be well prepared
to spar/to fight/to duke it out
